name: Monkey Kong world - The legend
description:
Monkey Kong the legend is a great and addictive game for all ages, kids and adults loves Kong and his crazy adventures in defeating the bosses along his way to saving the world.

Jump, slap, climb and throw your way through 36 different levels to find gold and coins.
It's hidden in a range of awesomely well-designed levels, and he's determined to find it all!

This is a free game for everyone to enjoy with NO in app purchases,
earn coins and unlock excitement stuff that will help you along the way.

Monkey Kong World features:
+ 36 well-designed levels
+ Amazing animations and in-game graphics
+ 4 different worlds to concur
+ 4 playable characters


Good luck playing.
